revised_title: The Inheritance of Hoariness in Stocks (Matthiola): A Revised Hypothesis
tldr: The author investigates the inheritance of hoariness in stocks (Matthiola) and discovers that two additional genetic factors, H and K, are required for hoariness, in addition to the color factors C and R. This finding refines the understanding of hoariness inheritance and expands the potential for breeding and selection in plants.
